## Model:


### [Introducing mlflow - Kevin Kuo](https://resources.rstudio.com/rstudio-conf-2019/introducing-mlflow)


use mlflow to record modeling building result 


### [parsnip: A tidy model interface - Max Kuhn](https://resources.rstudio.com/rstudio-conf-2019/parsnip-a-tidy-model-interface)


parsnip is a new tidymodels package that generalizes model interfaces across packages. The idea is to have a single function interface for types of specific models
